quest.id: +Quest For Black Bart's Flaming Dig Tools

property.name: offer
property.value: The Trader has an old weathered parchment tube that is claimed to be a map to the last great haul of the infamous stage-coach robber, Black Bart. It is offered to you in exchange for some resources and common digging tools to help the community procure more resources. Provide the trader with 600 Iron + 1 Iron Shovel + 1 Iron Pickaxe.
